abstract: rider shuts down scott , niagara for 99-76 win .
article: niagara falls , n. y. -- jordan allen had 18 points and nine rebounds , frederick scott added 16 points and rider beat niagara 99-76 on sunday . rider held the maac 's leading scorer , matt scott , to just five points on 0-of-9 shooting . rider opened the game on a 12-0 run and led 42-34 at halftime after shooting 53.1 percent from the field , but the broncs were just 6 of 14 from the free-throw line . after a four-rebound possession , karamoko cisse made a basket to put rider up 67-53 midway through the second half .

tyere marshall added 15 points for rider and stevie jordan had 12 points , six rebounds and seven assists . the broncs shot a season-high 52 percent from the field and held niagara to 35.5 . marvin prochet tied a career-high with four 3-pointers and scored 21 points for niagara . james towns added 14 points and kahlil dukes , ranked 24th in the nation at 21.8 points per game , scored 13 on 4-of-13 shooting . scott entered ranked eighth in scoring at 23.6 .
